sub_title: Frontend Developer at PVH Europe B.V.
summary:
As a frontend engineer, I specialize in creating dynamic and responsive user interfaces using React, Typescript, JavaScript, GraphQL, and NodeJS. My passion for agile development practices and trunk-based development, combined with a test-driven approach, allows me to deliver high-quality, scalable solutions efficiently.

Additionally, I have full-stack and backend development experience in creating web APIs using C# and Python, SQL (PostgreSQL, MS SQL) and NoSQL databases like MongoDB and Couchbase, and I have worked with various cloud technologies such as AWS, Azure, and Google Cloud. I also have experience with machine learning and data science, which allows me to develop innovative solutions that leverage cutting-edge technologies.

I am skilled in writing CI/CD pipelines, containerizing applications using Docker, and working with Git in TFS, GitLab, and GitHub. I am constantly curious and eager to learn new technologies and ways of working, which allows me to stay up-to-date with the latest industry trends and deliver the best solutions for companies.

Overall, my extensive experience and passion for technology, combined with my commitment to quality and efficiency, make me an ideal candidate for any team looking to develop innovative and scalable solutions.

certifications.name: CS300 & CD210 Couchbase NoSQL Server Administration & Development

projects.title: Knowledge Base for Service Desk
projects.description: Gathering user requirements, analyzing market for finished solutions. PHP Knowledge Base was chosen as basis for Unilever RUB Knowledge Base for Service Desk. Negotiation with vendor about customising his solution according to our requirements. Implemententing and beta-testing of the KB. Transfering old knowledge base to new one and adoptation. Project closed with success.

contributors.headline: Frontend Developer at PVH Europe B.V.
Senior Service Delivery Manager at EPAM Systems

profile_positions.description:
• Working in agile team on B2B Webshop Frontend and GraphQL using React, JavaScript, TypeScript
• Writing unit tests, integration and end-to-end tests using react testing library, jest and cypress to cover regression, improving application test coverage and automation and reliability of CI/CD pipelines
• Converting legacy parts of application from JavaScript to TypeScript
• Optimizing application and components load and performance
• Implementing mobile-first responsive design
• Creating StoryBook stories for components
• Participating in pair programming, front-end guild meetings, refinement sessions, retrospectives
• Writing documentation, sharing knowledge among team members about best practices in React, git and TypeScript, component naming and structure
profile_positions.title: Frontend Developer

profile_positions.description:
•	Working in agile scrum methodology in a team of senior developments, frequent code reviews, pair programming.
•	Development and support of C# backend solutions for SharePoint on Premise, MVC applications, Web API, integration with SAP API, MS SQL databases and SSIS packages
•	In charge of project for development front-end solution in SharePoint using React, typescript and test driven development (unit tests and integration test in selenium). That involved development, tests, meetings with stakeholders, gathering and analyzing business requirements, sprint review (demo) and planning, backlog management and holding refinement sessions
profile_positions.title: Software Engineer

profile_positions.description:
•      Development of CRM system (windows application)
•      Development of web (soap, web api) and windows services to support company driving business process including customer loan management and processing.
•      integration with third party services for mailing campaigning, payments and credit buiro reporting, telephony services (calls, client detection, autodialing)
•      automation of business routines
profile_positions.title: Back End Developer

profile_positions.description:
•	Administration of web and DB servers (Windows Server 2008/2012, MS SQL Standard), SharePoint Farms of test and production environments
•	Manage all aspects of SharePoint 2013 On-Premises, including design, performance, monitoring, and security, infrastructure, user access, and solution deployment, farm management
•	Train personnel on system usage (content administration, publication, team sites, OneDrive, Office Online, etc.)
•	Troubleshoot all SP related issues (working with MS Certified partners for escalations) 
•	Assist with recommending, scheduling and implementing system and/or software upgrades or repairs 
•	Evaluation and recommendation software and hardware products, add-ons for SharePoint (for development or end-use) for improving its integration with company's critical business services and decreasing time and costs for development and support of SP services
•	Front-end development of internal corporate services in the SharePoint environment using JavaScript, CSS3, HTML5 for desktop and mobile users (responsive design, mobile compatibility). Client-side rendering JavaScript customizations (CSR), React components, bootstrap for advanced controls and responsive design.
•	Back-end development of event listeners, web services, site features and solutions for MS SharePoint (C#), integration with other company's services via API (SOAP, REST).
•	Workflow and forms development using InfoPath, SharePoint Designer, Nintex Workflow and forms
•       Data migration (SP2010->SP2013) via AvePoint, experience with AvePoint products
•	Gathering business requirements for business process automation using SharePoint and translating them into technical requirements and developments stages
profile_positions.title: Software Engineer

profile_positions.description:
I was eployed by Kelly IT Resources as outsource IT specialist for Unilever RUB (Russia-Ukraine-Belarus) IT department. My projects and duties:
•      SharePoint site administration, creation of new sites, user support and development of new services based on SharePoint (2003-2010 on-Premises, 2013 Online) site for IT, HR, Supply chain functions.
•       Adoptation of Sharepoint training materials to Russian language and promotion of SharePoint in Business as a solution fot document management and workflow automation
•       Development of ASP.Net sites (C#) for Supply Chain business processes
•	Administration activities on SharePoint, regular training about SharePoint for the business, help with migration of business processes, workflows, data from MS Office and network drives to SharePoint and OneDrive environment
•	Migration of team and personal sites to SharePoint Online and OneDrive for Business
•	development of VBA Excel solutions integrated SharePoint sites (pivot tables, custom functions, modules, macros, menu, user forms, complicated business logic, data import and export to and from SQL, SP, files)
•	development of various script (Python, VBs, shell bat files/bash) for administration and bug-fix purposes
•	development of SharePoint sites for internal processes of IT, HR, supply chain, finance, marketing departments (JavaScript, JQuery, HTML, CSS customizations, custom forms, workflows, etc.).
•	development of databases for web solutions, maintaining/administrating DB and web servers
•	development of ASP.Net C# web forms sites for automation of complex business processes (full stack, database creation and administration in MS SQL Express).
profile_positions.title: Software Engineer

profile_positions.description:
IT routines automation using VBA, VBscript, shell scripting
IT Knowledge base project: I was searching for production-ready solution for internal IT support knowledge base, negotiating with parties and finally selected and deployed a demo version of knowledge base for the IT Department.
After finishing the internship at Unilerver RUB (IT department) I was employed by Unilever as an outsource IT Specialist and worked over other projects next 5 years in Unilever
profile_positions.title: IT Intern
